response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit and elevate your business operations. Given its immense value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a strategic investment opportunity that could potentially increase your profitability by up to 30%. We understand the importance of this decision and are confident that our product will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
